name: Moto Fever 3D - Moto Simulator
description:
The once popular motorcycle game is now back!
Start your motorcycle racing now and challenge all kinds of levels to become a good motorcyclist!
Unlike other motorcycle games, this is just a small but funny pocket game.

Game features:
- Enjoy the game experience: feel the thrilling experience of dozing in the traffic from the first-person perspective. Follow the intense music and enjoy the thrill of overtaking!

- Realistic 3D scenes and vehicle models: Next-generation rendering technology creates real-world scenes for you. Freely switching between highways, city streets, and other scenes. You will experience real racing that you have never felt before,

- Choose models at your will: 10 of the most classic motorcycles in history. You can also upgrade your motor from many aspects- power, brakes, maneuverability, etc. There are many kinds of gameplay to explore!

- Various game modes are waiting for you: In the time mode, you have to race against time. In the racing mode, just speed up to break the limit. In the overtaking mode, go beyond those unqualified rookie drivers! No matter which game mode, things to do are very simple - choose the motor, then step on it and just accelerate! Become the king of this track adventure!

Go surpass yourself and write your own legend in motorcycles!
